name: Vehicle 4G Tracker
detail: Track Always AI-Based Smart 4G Tracker for Vehicles & Personal Use, Real-Time Location, Geo-Fencing, Alerts, Route History
detail1: Real-Time Tracking: Gain complete visibility over your vehicle or asset with this AI-based smart GPS tracker that provides real-time location updates.
detail2: Geo-Fencing Capabilities: Set up virtual boundaries and receive instant alerts when your tracked object enters or exits the designated areas.
detail3: Route History: Monitor and review the complete route history of your tracked item, enabling you to analyse travel patterns and optimise efficiency.
description: Introducing the Track Always AI-based Smart 4G Tracker, an innovative device designed to empower connectivity and enhance efficiency. This cutting-edge tracker utilises advanced GPS technology to provide real-time location tracking for vehicles and personal use.
shortDescription: Stay connected with your tracker through dedicated mobile apps available on both the App Store and Google Play Store.

name: Wireless Tracker 6000
detail: The Wireless Tracker 6000 is a cutting-edge, compact power bank that ensures you never have to worry about running out of battery. Ideal for travelers, students, and professionals, it supports fast charging and is compatible with multiple devices.
detail1: Equipped with 10,000mAh of power, the Tracker 6000 can fully charge most smartphones up to three times on a single charge. Its sleek design is crafted for portability, making it easy to slip into any bag or pocket.
detail2: This power bank also features intelligent protection technology to guard against overcharging, overheating, and short circuits, so your devices stay safe while charging.
detail3: Comes with universal compatibility, supporting iPhone, Android, tablets, and even smaller laptops. The Wireless Tracker 6000 is also built with a convenient LED display to indicate power levels at a glance.
description: Never run out of battery again with our high-capacity portable charger. The Wireless Tracker 6000 offers reliable, high-speed charging on the go, perfect for all your devices. Its compact design and powerful capacity make it a must-have for anyone on the move.
shortDescription: High-speed charging, portable and powerful with a sleek design.

name: Wireless Tracker 10000
detail: Introducing the Wireless Tracker 10000, a cutting-edge Bluetooth tracker designed to help you keep track of your valuables effortlessly. Its sleek, compact design makes it easy to attach to keys, bags, or anything you don't want to lose.
detail1: Equipped with advanced GPS technology, the Wireless Tracker 10000 provides real-time location updates, ensuring you can always find your essentials. The user-friendly mobile app allows you to monitor your items with ease.
detail2: Featuring a long-lasting battery life, this tracker is built to withstand your daily adventures. With its robust construction and water-resistant design, it’s perfect for outdoor use, making it ideal for travelers and busy individuals.
detail3: The Wireless Tracker 10000 also includes a built-in alarm feature that alerts you when you’re out of range of your belongings. Never worry about losing your important items again, thanks to this innovative solution.
description: Stay organized and keep track of your belongings with the Wireless Tracker 10000. Designed for those who lead a busy lifestyle, this tracker offers peace of mind and convenience.
shortDescription: Advanced Bluetooth tracker with real-time GPS, long battery life, and alarm feature.
